job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T15:26:04.000Z", "description": "

Responsibilities


  • Work with a small team of data scientists, software engineers and domain experts to build the next generation of Novi\u2019s platform
  • Develop novel solutions to open-ended, challenging and long-standing industry problems
  • Engage in thought leadership within the company and community
  • Mentor other team members on domain knowledge and technical solutions
  • Develop software to deliver solutions to ill-posed problems using sparse, noisy spatiotemporal data


Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum 5 years of hands-on data science and machine learning experience
  • Foundation in integrating data-driven methods with physics-based models
  • Strong foundation in statistics and machine Learning
  • Strong software engineering principles and software development lifecycle experience (e.g., git, unit tests, CI)
  • Strong familiarity with Python and PyData stack (e.g., pandas, numpy, scipy)
  • Strong familiarity with ML Frameworks (e.g., scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow)
  • Experience going from algorithm development to production code
  • Experience modeling time series and spatial datasets
  • Experience deploying callable ML models in a production environment (e.g., REST API, TensorFlow Serving)


Preferred Skills & Experience

  • Open-source plotting libraries (e.g., altair, matplotlib, holoviz)
  • Database query & ETL (SQL & NoSQL)
  • AWS tools (e.g., lambda, EC2, etc.)
  • Probabilistic programming (e.g., Stan, PyMC, Pyro)
  • Model interpretation and explainability tools (e.g., Shapley)
  • Linux systems and command-line interfaces (e.g., bash)
  • Container and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Nomad)
  • Previous work on an agile team
  • Experience in oil and gas
